name: Serren's Swift Girding
source: Knights of the Inner Sea pg. 29
components: V, S, M (the armor to be worn)
text: With a sweep of your hand, you select a number of targets and the same number of suits of armor. The targets of this spell are immediately clad in the armor that you choose. The subjects of the spell must be capable of wearing the chosen armor, cannot be wearing other armor, and must be able to properly fit into the chosen armor. The chosen armor must be empty and cannot be currently worn by another creature (thus you cannot move armor from one wearer to another with this spell). Creatures armored with this spell are considered to have donned the armor properly.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、材料 (将要被穿上的盔甲)
text_zh: 随着你手一挥，你可以选择数个目标以及和目标同等数量的盔甲。此法术的受术者们立即被你所选择的盔甲所复盖。此法术的受术者们必须能够穿着被选择的盔甲，同时身上不能穿着其他盔甲，并且必须能正确的穿戴此盔甲。被选择的盔甲必须中空，并且当前不能被另一个生物穿戴在身上(因此你不能使用此法术将盔甲从他当前的穿戴者移到另一个身上)。透过此法术身着盔甲的生物，被视为正确的穿戴了此盔甲。
